content: designed to show off the fabulous colours of rasta - just one skein - about 2 hours one tester made one in 1 hour 20 minutes ☻ * it has purl sections because i like the woven effect you get when you purl with rasta * it has slipped stitches because i think they help to highlight the shading they also make it easy to make cables without a cable needle ☻ * it has twists because it s nice to have something to do every few row so you don t get bored ☻ * it s tapered towards the top for a nice fit the instructions are both written and charted so you can choose which you like best **erratum -** on row 8 you should have 54 sts not 56 after the decreases
